value:
My sister Shanna has so much
potential. If she would just focus,
I'd be a lot less worried.

Ilia is a desolate, snowbound land...$k$pMany of us take to the mercenary
trade just to survive...the men astride
horses and the women, pegasi.

If you're indisposed, what will we do?
Go on, take a rest. I know my way
around a patrol route.

You're ordering me to go shopping?
Well, if you say so. Oh, you thought
it'd be a nice change of pace? Er...

I'm glad there's plenty of horse feed
here. We mercenaries rely on our
pegasi, so their food comes first.

You're $Nu?
A boon, from $Nf.

I feel as though I could
defeat any foe.

I must prepare for my next
battle. I might face anything.

If I keep on like this, I'll
disgrace the pegasus
knights...

Ah, that's good! I'll show
you the strength of Ilia's
pegasus knights.

I am Thea, an Ilian pegasus knight.
I shall place myself under your
command. Orders?

I'd like to have a word with you,
$Nu!$k$pDuring the last battle, you put me
in the rear, on standby! Why?$k$pIt doesn't matter if the enemy wields
bows. I am a soldier. Where you need
me, I go.$k$pI trust you, and I rely on your orders,
so, please—trust in me as well.$k$pNo matter where the fight takes us,
I will be there to intercept any attack.
I hope you know you can rely on me.$k$pWell then! That's settled. Leave it to
me. I swear on Ilia and on my pride
as a mercenary—you will be safe.
はっ！
てやっ！
きゃああっ！
こんな…
Ready your weapon.
No matter the enemy!
It's my battle to fight!
Charge into battle!
Juno... Shanna...
Yes?
Ilia is cold and destitute. Being a mercenary is the only way to make a living.
What did you say? This is no time for jokes!
"Never go back on a promise once made." This is the pledge of the Knights of Ilia, the mantra I abide by.
Ilia is a country of mercenaries, where the bond with a weapon is stronger than any ties to blood.
My sisters and I are all Pegasus Knights. I am the middle child, of course.
Shanna...my dear sister. May no harm fall upon you.
Regardless of what may come...I choose to believe in you.
At your command.
What's the plan?
I believe in this fight.
